duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage clinical research activities for oncology trials, ensuring adherence to protocols and regulatory requirements.
Recruit and screen eligible patients for participation in oncology trials, providing education and obtaining informed consent.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals and research teams to execute clinical trial procedures and collect accurate data.
Maintain detailed records of study procedures, patient assessments, and adverse events according to established standards.
Communicate with sponsors, investigators, and regulatory authorities to facilitate study progress and ensure compliance.
Contribute to the development of research protocols and documentation, and assist with institutional review board submissions.

education_certification.credential: RN Licensure with clinical research certification or relevant healthcare degree (e.g., BSN, MSN)
